data.actual_result: Audio clip appears paused at play time at the point of last switch to other desktop, but if the play button is pushed it restarts from 0:00 regardless
data.expected_result: Audio clip displays with current time 0:00, plays from start if play button pressed
data.short_description: Audio player playback time does not update properly if clip ends while on separate desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload audio file with inline player in public channel, private message, etc. - Play audio file from any point - Switch to separate desktop or fullscreen app (on macOS; uncertain if there's any equivalent to this degree of window suspending on Windows) - Stay on separate desktop until audio clip has ended - Switch to original desktop
